extendedInfo.description: Never lose the photos from your phone again. Get 5 GB of free storage to protect and store your phoneâs photos with Amazon Cloud Drive. Access photos from your Android phone or tablet, your computer, or any web browser. Your memories: safe and secure in the Cloud.Features:-	Store and secure thousands of photos with 5 GB of free storage-        Never lose a photo again â your photos are automatically saved to your Cloud Drive -	Upload individual photos or entire albums from your phone or tablet with one simple touch-	View your photo albums in stunning layouts from your mobile device or on your computer-	Share your Cloud Drive photos on Facebook, through e-mail, and many other apps

reviews.title: Changed my review
reviews.comment: Got to sync my phone w/ kinde but although I have the setting to auto update most of my pics r missing. Finding this app useleas at the moment!
reviews.author: Amanda Williams

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Can\'t move it to the sd card. No room on my phone for this app because all the other app developers refuse to control the size of their code. So I have to remove this unfortunately.
reviews.author: Blair Wolf

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Razor M
reviews.comment: WORKED FINE AT FIRST BUT THEN I PAID $25.00 AND NOW it uploads photos automatically to the cloud but can\'t see any photos on the cloud.
reviews.author: Dan Poel

reviews.title: Cloud for my pics
reviews.comment: It\'s a great place to put them if you are low on space and it\'s so easily
reviews.author: Karen Corbin

reviews.title: Fab app
reviews.comment: very useful for sites i love amazing storage easy to use  well done
reviews.author: Emma Bolton

reviews.title: Good service
reviews.comment: The only thing I would like to see with this and the pc and kindle apps is something in the settings that lets the user choose if video gets uploaded or not, I travel a lot and bandwidth can be pricey.
reviews.author: myrrdin anderson

reviews.title: 2* for the space but I want my FILES STORED too!!!
reviews.comment: This is cool and all I guess, but it  absolutely DOES NOT compare to te competition.  Why just have photos? The desktop app and online can use files (they don\'t even need to have a 2gig max like the comp, because I understand the limits on space) but really, this app is pointless.   I already have a picture cloud built in to android -- it\'s called Picasso and I didn\'t have to waste phone space (even though my GS3 is 64G so I\'m fine on that) so WTF?  Don\'t waste your time, unless you ONLY want pictures on the cloud.  Otherwise wait until Amazon falls back into the same level as the VERY MANY better functioning, just as reliable  cloud storage apps and allow audio/video/text files to be saved on the cloud.  I\'ll stick to my Google Drive and Microsoft SkyDrive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time. Every time I take a picture it goes to the cloud! Who could ask for anything more.
reviews.author: Vincent Candido, Sr.

reviews.title: Fixed!
reviews.comment: Now this app has automatic upload capability, and video too, it\'s getting 5 stars from me. Amazon also provides by far the cheapest cloud storage subscription I\'ve found.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Since update..
reviews.comment: App won\'t go past the video intro screen. Uninstalled and reinstalled, now it won\'t go past the auto-save screen. I cannot access my photos. FIX IT!
reviews.author: Carly Klatt

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: switched from old windows 7 phone to android & was having difficulty moving pics, ebooks and contacts....well, I won\'t have to stress over THAT MESS again!!!!
reviews.author: Carolyn Simien

reviews.title: That was fast!
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Suzanne Bennett

reviews.title: kim
reviews.comment: It works ok on Samsung Galaxy S3 but won\'t even open on Samsung tablet. What\'s up with that, it seems you guys have some catching up to do with other competitors.
reviews.author: Kim Davis

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very nice and ez app
reviews.author: Randy Burris

reviews.title: SUPER NICE
reviews.comment: ENJOYING SHOWING OFF PICTURES THIS IS THE BEST WAY TO GO. Especially when a person is on the move.
reviews.author: Rebecca Monter

reviews.title: NOOOOOO!
reviews.comment: I lost all my babies videos and half my photos! Waiting to hear back from Amazon. I\'m so heartbroken:\'(
reviews.author: Lisa Brown

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: All it does is say down loading to the cloud but nothing happens!
reviews.author: Don Jones

reviews.comment: Only does photos. Not what I wanted. I need access to my whole drive like google drive. SUCKS!
reviews.author: Thomas Boomer

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used androids only and have not found a storage decice that allows u the option to upload from different devices.  No crashing, you can upload and browse the gallery.  No my worrying over lost moments. Spread the word!
reviews.author: tawana akins

reviews.comment: Great to upload and view on all your devices
reviews.author: Douglas Worley
